Hi all
Did I imagine it or is there a url parameter I can add HubSpot images to prevent them from being output as webp format?

My teammate isn't getting the Edit Sprocket that appears in the top right of a page when logged in... This appears to be the reason why but I'm pretty confused as it's working for the rest of us... Anybody ever seen this?
That often means they've got their browser security settings clamped down e.g. "Block third-party cookies and site data"
